title: Npack executor
description: Creates npm-compatible tarballs (.tgz) for local installation, mimicking npm pack behavior but much faster.

targetPath.description: Workspace-relative or absolute path to the package root.

targetName.description: Nx project name of the package if targetPath is not provided.

outputPath.description: Directory for output tarball (defaults to package root).

keepTemp.description: Keep temporary staging directory after packaging (defaults to false).

tempPath.description: Base directory for temporary staging (defaults to package root/.npack).

freshTemp.description: Clean previous temp directories for this package (defaults to true).

includeFiles.description: Additional files/directories to include beyond package.json 'files' field.

excludeFiles.description: Files/directories to exclude from the tarball.

dev.description: Build a dev tarball (adds -dev suffix and version with NX_TASK_HASH).

installGlobal.description: Install the tarball globally with pnpm after creation (defaults to true).
